actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands and Reserved Water. Hearings held. Hearings printed:  S.Hrg. 98-977.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from Interior Department. Favorable.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator McClure under the authority of the order of Jun 29, 84 with amendments. With written report No. 98-554.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1050.
Passed Senate with amendments by Voice Vote.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the city of Brigham City, Utah, certain land and improvements in Box Elder County, Utah.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey by quitclaim deed without consideration to the city of Brigham City, Utah, all Federal right, title and interest in remaining Federal property at the Intermountain Indian Boarding School when such property ceases to be used for Indian school purposes.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the city of Brigham City, Utah, certain land and improvements in Box Elder County, Utah.
